segments.text: I'd like to buy a fridge . What about the quality of higher products ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I strongly recommend it . As an international enterprise , it produces high quality household appliances .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , all their products have warranties .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The fridges is covered by a one-year warranty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which model is the best seller of this year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This one . How do you like it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's too big for me . Could you recommend something else ?
segments.speaker: S1
